snippet.title: Cairn: Mathair's Curse - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist here! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1302530/Cairn_Mathairs_Curse/

Cairn: Mathair's Curse is Scottish JRPG set in the coastal region of Albaness! Explore hand-crafted pixel art locations, fight strange and unusual enemies, and enjoy the 16-bit Scottish inspired soundtrack, in this turn-based RPG. 

One family, a group of good friends and a journey into the heart of an ancient curse that threatens it all. Do you have what it takes to protect the ones you love?

Coming 2022
